## QuestionWrapper interface

Describes a wrapper for a question component with additional information

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QuestionWrapper 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [component](./dynamic-forms.questionwrapper.component.md) | Type&lt;[QuestionComponent](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The component that should be rendered |
|  [hideOnValueChange?](./dynamic-forms.questionwrapper.hideonvaluechange.md) | [ControlHook](./dynamic-forms.controlhook.md)<!-- -->&lt;boolean&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> If set the question will be hidden when the hook returns true. |
|  [question](./dynamic-forms.questionwrapper.question.md) | [Question](./dynamic-forms.question.md) | The question component view configuration |
